column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////On a recent weekday (March '19)
column2: I ate lunch with a friend and ordered the "Ancient Grains with Chickpea Croquettes" salad. This is a hearty salad that contains farro
column11: and sun-dried tomato ranch. I like that the salad was not overly-dressed and the chickpea croquettes added such a pleasant texture to the salad. I would order this again
column13: I feel that $14 is way too much for a salad. In fact
column14: the food prices are the reason I can't give Common Bond 5 stars.
